title: Pneumatic Scotch Yoke Rotary Actuators (PDS)
excerpt: High-performance pneumatic actuators featuring the scotch yoke mechanism for reliable rotary motion control.

title: Gearboxes — ITG Series
excerpt: Robust and efficient gearbox solutions engineered for various torque requirements and speed reduction applications.

title: Electro-Hydraulic Actuators
